ygData.subject: Re: Looking for spellcomponents
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you for you response. I am looking for any and all of them. I have bought Ice of Velious but failed in my research. Any hints are appreciated. Let me
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you for you response. I am looking for any and all of them. I have
bought Ice of Velious but failed in my research. Any hints are appreciated.
Let me know if you need a list of them. I need both words and components.

Eldran


-----Original Message-----
From: TkAdam@... <TkAdam@...>
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 6:49 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Looking for spellcomponents


>From: TkAdam@...
>

some

>

>
>Sonoroud Tomebinder

>--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------

Please keep the emails on topic. Offensive remarks will not be tolerated,
no warnings. Apologies will be considered, but repeat offenders will be
banned permanently.
